com.vernalis.rest

Class JsonRestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vernalis.rest.JsonRestClient

  • public class JsonRestClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides basic connectivity to a RESTful web service via a POST request returning a JSON object
    Since:
    1.28.0

                                         java.lang.String data,
                                         boolean isInputJson)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the result of a POST operation as an InputStream.
        Parameters:
        url - the url
        data - the data to post
        isInputJson - whether the POST body data is JSON format
        Returns:
        the input stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

                                                                java.lang.String query,

                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        url - The url to post the request to
        query - The request body
        isInputJson - Whether the input is JSON
        Returns:
        The JsonNode result of calling the service
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there was an error calling the service
